This is a technique in which Shion's [[Bell (charm)|bell]] projects a hologram around the individual that is currently holding the bell, intercepting any damage that may pose a threat to them. [[Miroku]] says that nothing could destroy it and with its properties, Shion would be fully protected. She still has the power to explode threats that abut, as she did with the body of [[Mōryō]].
